body: Yes, absolutely, the guide needs to be aligned with the upgrade. The example [have been already aligned](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus-quickstarts/blob/e0ff62e3f56572c463104f5cf95e79af5ae4ae9c/spring-data-rest-quickstart/src/main/java/org/acme/spring/data/rest/FruitsRepository.java#L5) and is using the JpaRepository in order to have operation from both, CrudRepository and PageAndSortingRepository.
@aureamunoz do you plan to update the docs?
Yes! I plan working on that asap. Later this week.

issue.title: Spring APIs - Document newly supported interfaces and update existing examples
